Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Controller
    Key handler to control a Walker.
    ControlPanel
    The GUI buttons located at the bottom of the window in game
    ConveyerBelt
    This class is so the package itself moves along the belt
    Crash
    Crash Bandicoot is the right most player.
    Dalek
    Dalek character class.
    DalekController
    Controller class to control the Dalek player utilizing comma, period and space buttons
    Enemy
    Enemy character class
    EnemyListener
    Collision Listener class for use by Enemy class
    Game
    A world with some bodies.
    GameLevel
    A level of the game.
    GiveFocus
    A mouse listener that gives the keyboard focus to a specified component.
    Homer
    Homer is 2nd player to the left of the game.
    HomerController
    Controller specifically for Homer
    InstructionScreen
    Instruction screen JFrame with instructions on the gameplay and controls
    Level1
    Level 1 of the game
    Level2
    Level 2 of the game
    Level3
    Level 3 of the game
    LevelStartState
    State at the beginning of the level to move the package to the left conveyer when Crash is in the vicinity
    MainMenu
    Main menu JFrame class which runs first to start the game
    MoveUpCrashState
    State which moves the package to the next conveyer and moves it leftwards.
    MoveUpHomerState
    State which moves package to next conveyer and moves rightwards
    MyView
    Handles the background image and the foreground Score text.
    Omnitrix
    Pickup item that increases the timer by 10 seconds
    Packaging
    Class for the Package object that the player has to get to the top of the screen
    Pickup
    Collision listener that allows the player to collect things.
    Pipe
    Simple pipe image
    TardisDemat
    Object which is used as the destination in the game
    TardisListener
    Listener for collision with a door.
    Tracker
    Unused tracker class
    Zeiton7
    Item that the player has to pickup to score points.
